content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my backyard on the cell phone when i noticed the object moving west from the direction of seaside, nj. i got off the phone so i could video the object because i had seen the same thing on july3, 2010 moving from west to east through an easterly breeze and right through a firework display. this orange/red glowing object appeared as a large paper bag shape that glowed from inside with a bright white light. it moved from east to west at slow speed(about 20mph)for around a minute before slowly turning to the north. it moved to the north for about another minute before it disappeared in the distance.

approximately a half hour later, the same thing happened, this time as i filmed it, a passenger jet or other plane passed in the distance to the north.

this object or objects glowed between dim red and bright yellow from the inside, made no noise, was very steady in the sky even though the video makes it look like the object(s) are tumbling.

when i saw this type of object on july 3rd, 2013, my wife was in bed beginning to go into labor with our 2nd child. when i was outside watching the fireworks display when i saw the object. it was in view for long enough for me to wake my wife and ask her to come out for a look. she got up and looked at it and agreed that she was looking at something unusual that looked like a glowing shopping bag or paper chinese lantern.
content.summary: Looked like a red paper bag with a candle in it moving west then north

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
07/22/13 - approx. 10:47 pm pst - novato, ca

i was so excited about my recent sightings on the 14th and 21st that i told my friends while we were hanging out at vintage oaks shopping center. they couldn't believe it, so i showed them the videos. they then were excited and wanted to go hunting for ufo's later that night. i mentioned that seeing a ufo once in your life is rare, and that twice in a week is beyond normal. but i wasn't opposed, so i just assured them not to get their hopes up and that it would be fun to see one.

later that night i grabbed my camera and we hiked up miwok hill in novato. it is my favorite place to hangout. it has a bench at the top of the hill and you can see almost all of novato from this one spot. 

we sat down on the bench and watched the skies for quite a while. at one point my friend said that he heard something coming towards us. i was recording some test shots right before, so i redirected my attention to directly in front of us. then we saw a flashlight. it was just people. i stopped recording and realized that it was my old friends from middle school. i hadn't seen them since i was about 13. i am 21 now. as we were talking i realized that there was a bright orange light hovering nearby. i started to record it, my friend asked what i was doing so i told him i was filming for a movie so i wouldn't be embarrassed about what i was really doing. i really didn't want them to know i was investigating ufo's so i tried to play it off as i recorded the object. at this moment i thought it was the same craft from the 14th and mentioned it to my friends who were watching intently. then i sparked up a conversation about a friend of mine from middle school that i saw earlier that day when we were hanging out at the shopping center. as we were talking, one of my friends mentioned that "it was happening". i replied that i too thought it was happening. we laughed in excitement. he told me to try to focus to see if it was dropping anything. i was trying my best at this point to not shake the camera and get a clear image. i couldn't believe it was actually happening again! what are the chances!!! it soon after flew behind some clouds.

after the sighting, a helicopter flew through the area.

the area of the sky where we observed the craft was very clear. there was no wind at the time of the sighting. very calm weather. 

there were 5 witnesses. 2 of them didnt know exactly what tey were witnessing. the other 2 were my friends who came to hunt for the ufo. and then myself makes 5.

upon analyzing the footage, the craft can be seen dropping objects multiple times throughout the video! the most notable are at 01:30 and 01:40 in the clip.

attached is the original video, the enhanced version of the video, and a map of the flight path.
content.summary: Ufo dropping objects over novato for the second time

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was just pulling into the parking lot at work when i looked up and saw 4 distinct orange fireballs/orbs. there was a very thin cloud cover and these objects were well below the clouds. i could not believe my eyes so i walked into work. i came 5 minutes later to double take what i had just saw and i was amazes. i watched these things for about 10 minutes until i looked away for maybe 2 seconds then looked up and they were gone simultaneously. at work i went up tothe top floor (3 story building) and witnessed 2 of the lights again but this time they hovered over the airport. i didn't watch them for long they moved very slowly almost mistook them as a light until they moved. i went downstairs to get my phone to attempt a picture but they were gone by the time i made it up. so i went outside to see and found only one orb this time and it was over the ocean.  i watched this one until it just disappeared without a trace.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange orange orbs/fireballs hovered over town. disapear simultaneously

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)

content.detailedDescription: Red light that hovered, changed direction and sped away.
content.summary: Flew over house without noise

content.detailedDescription:
Slightly faster than plane slowly dimmed and ascended out of atmosphere

there were planes in the sky to compare to

very bright at first then slowly dimmed and disappeared

i was with my boyfriend as he was smoking a cigarette and we were talking and as i hugged him i noticed the object in the sky. we then both watched as the object dimmed and ascended into space. the object slowly moved in an outward and upward direction into space.

we were both awe-struck, but this wasn't the first time we had seen something like that before. it feels amazing seeing something like that, like there are secrets the majority of us humans do not know. it may be the government, or something else.
content.summary: Star like ball of light brighter than average star moving slightly faster than plane slowly dimmed and ascended out of atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: I was outside and glanced at the sky when i saw two red/orange lights traveling very slowly from the south at approximately 45 degrees from the horizon. i struck me odd how slowly they were traveling and were traveling on a single file path. i thought maybe they were helicopters because there is a lot of air traffic in los angeles. but i couldn't hear any sound from them. i called my wife outside so she could see them. as she came out, one of them flickered and dimmed but i could still see the object, somewhat from the light reflection from the city. it appeared round but faceted. my wife was able to see the other when it started flickering and dimming. at that point the objects were both dark except for the reflection of the city lights changed direction and headed northwest. i watched until my vision was blocked and couldn't see them anymore. their altitude could have been 1000 to 5000 feet. it was difficult to tell, there were other common aircraft in the sky such as planes and helicopters but not near these objects.
content.summary: Two bright orange/red lights traveling north one behind the other then started flickering out one after the other

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting on the balcony talking an then out of the corner of our eyes we saw a glowing orange/yellow flaming circular object peaking through the clouds in the eastern sky, at first thinking it was the moon but then realizing that it is 12:08am an the moon is not normally in that position for us, we turned an looked an saw the outline of the moon behind clouds where it is normally. we then refocused on the object still peaking through the clouds showing 1/2 to 2/3 rds of what looked like a burning planet an as we were watching and trying to figure out what it was, the object got brighter and then slowly started fading away and then it disappeared with the clouds covering it and then a couple minutes later a glow coming from behind the clouds in the same area and then it just faded away. its now 1:07am an have been out here watching the area and still nothing else has appeared since then.
content.summary: Looked like half a burning planet

content.detailedDescription: I was going to the store left my house. turned down alley and saw what appeared to be embers from a fire in the sky i stopped car and listened for any sirens nothing it appeared to be a few blocks over coming up from house i was sure it was a house fire with embers floating up into the sky but when i noticed they were moving up down and side to side and one shot out of the group and flew at a very fast rate of speed to my right i knew this wasn't embers from a fire i got my cell phone out and tried to take pics but i was so nervous and the street light wouldn't allow my pics to come out i gave up and continued to watch my wife was with me she said i was nuts and made me get back in car she saw it to . so i got in my car went to gas station a few blocks from my house and kept looking in direction lights were coming from and still saw them i guess it went on for about 10 minutes its like they we flying up from the ground up into sky i felt excited that i actually witnessed it i am a knowledgeable person and could tell this was very unusual and haven't really talked about because you had to see it to believe it . i am 100 percent sure it was not anything man made the way it moved very fast when departing and flying low and sideways they appeared to be small.I felt normal but lucky and excited to witness this i have never witnessed nything like this in my life and am 43 years old thanks for listening to my story.
content.summary: It was burning embers from a fire but much larger

content.detailedDescription: Driving my full-sized pick-up truck south down 12th st in phx,az at 8:15 pm,i was looking at the air traffic at sky harbor.I saw what i thought was a shooting star about 2/3 from the top of my field of vision.The light stopped it's quick descent to about 1/3 down my field of vision and i clearly saw that it was 3 separate lights in straight sucession and close together.Then lights simply disappered.The lights were very bright white.They were definitely between me and the airport, which put them right over downtown phoenix.The sighting was over in 2 seconds.Being an avid sky watcher,the lights were definitely anomolous,not pyrotechnics,a blimp, a chopper, etc.I pulled into my driveway 2 minutes later and ran into the street looking for something, anything but it was simply over.
content.summary: 3 lights over phoenix

content.detailedDescription:
I went out into my backyard with dogs just before 10pm.  my home is in park ridge, just east of ohare, so air traffic is common.  as i looked up, i noticed a bright orange light, moving slowly but smoothly in a south to north direction.  it seemed to stall (hover) and then dipped vertically and seemed to make almost a figure 8 path, then appearing to come westward (toward my position) slightly until it started drifting smoothly north again.  my initial impression was that it was a flare or firework...But its light neither diminished nor became a firework.  i watched it for approximately 2 minutes.  the dogs had no noticeable reaction.  there was no sound from it. it was moving slowly enough that i thought i could get inside to get a camera.

when i returned within about 20 seconds, i came back outside and could see the light through a tree in my back yard, still elevated (but under the clouds) and moving slowly (south to north).  from my position, i would estimate it was a couple miles east of me.  it's a cloudy night, but it was lower than the clouds.  as i tried to fix my camera on it (using an ipad), it took a smooth, ascending trajectory at a slight northeast direction.  its path, at this point, looked like how a jet flies, but there was still no sound and it was still the bright (non pulsing) orange light.  it disappeared into the clouds.  i could not get an image on the ipad.

my own reaction to it was immediately, "what the hell is that?" thinking it may be a flare, but then when it dipped, i thought...Could that be a helicopter (too abrupt in its movement and way too bright of an orange, non-aviation light).  then i quickly wondered if it could be a remote control plane...But it's 10pm, too bright and if it were a rc plane, with a light that bright, it would have been on the next street, and i would have been able to hear it.  because its movement was initially south to north, i did not believe it was a jet from ohare (their flight paths are almost always east/west, west/east over our house) and with its slowed rate and vertical movement, lack of sound, constant light, i thought there was minimal chance of it being commercial aircraft.

admittedly, i'm interested in ufos.  however, living near ohare, i've never had an experience in which i thought it was anything other than an aircraft.  i've never made a report like this before.  by profession, i'm a clinical psychologist, so i'd like to think i'm able to be relatively objective.
content.summary: Bright orange light smoothly changing direction (vertically) in a south to north path...Then ascending and heading east in a direct line

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv and i randomly went outside and played with my dog as i laided in the grown i notice 3 white spehers ina shape of a triangle i stare for about 4 mins and 1 disappears then one of them moves away from the other and both disappeared . the in the distance 2 more appeared white spheres . and disappeared 10 min later . after about 30 seconds 4 more ppeared .. then disappeared in about 6 min then 2 red sphere flying in opposite directions then a red cone shaped . after about 6 more appeared randomly and disappeared they were so far my cheap camera could not focus but i have 7 witnesses who saw with me.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White lights  , about 15 white spheres and 2 red spheres and 1 red cone shaped

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend where on ower whay to see the new star trek. at the portage imax. we where going west on 1100. i first saw it when we reached 1100 and merridian. through the trees i seen blinking lights and it looked odd. further down the rode less than a half mile.When no more trees were in the way    i could see two sepperat blue long lights flashing next to each other. i was on the passeger side. they where hovering over porter cove. when we were parallel with it it dissapered. all i can sayis that it wasent a plane or helicoptor. or anything else. i take ufos verey seriously and thats that.
content.summary: Two long cylindrcal light flashing in the sky low altitude

content.detailedDescription:
The first being i saw (there were either 2, or 1 i suppose.  both seen on different dates.)  was witnessed only by myself (as far as i know,) and it occurred while i was driving down a road adjacent to our own.  at the end of the road (it is a dead end,) i saw a slightly blurred-out looking white being, maybe 4-5 feet in height.  it darted into the woods surrounding the road, the sighting probably not lasting for more than 1-2 seconds.  no one else in the vehicle seemed to have witnessed it, but friends who live on the same road the white entity was sighted on seemed to have also witnessed (on separate occasions,) a mysterious white figure.  similar in stature to "the moth man."  

the second time i saw a white being, i was walking in the opposite direction up the very same road.  (both of these incidents were before the ufo sighting i witnessed on july 27th, but i can not recall the exact date.  no more then 2 weeks apart.)  i was looking down at my feet as i walked.  there was a sulfurous smell in the air, similar to what i could smell at the time of the ufo sighting.  in any event, i looked up, and just before a bend in the road stood a similar (or the same, who knows?)  white being, still seemingly blurred.  it quickly darted around the bend, and i lost sight of it.  no visible features, other than a white human-like shape.  for one reason or another, i thought nothing of it.  i simply went on walking in the same direction, but did not come across it again.

now, on the the ufo sighting.  i was taking a walk only meters away from the bottom of my driveway when i noticed a strange sulfurous smell in the air.  i witnessed a strange plane fly overhead, which is strange in our area.  it looked almost like a nasa space shuttle in plane-form.  silly as it sounds, i'll try to describe it.  it had an orange stripe on the back and nose, and the rest was white.  the orange almost seemed like a separate piece-- it actually looked a bit like a missile.  but it was moving at a relatively normal speed.  it was obviously earthly in origin.  moving on, though, i walked further down our road only to see/hear more planes-- about 4 in total, i believe.  i was watching one plane when i heard another behind me, and turned around.  maybe a 1/2 second to 1 second later, a match-head size (from my perspective, it must have been high in the air,)  metallic spherical object came into view.  i don't recall how, it just kind of appeared in my visual range.  it "flew" in a straight trajectory for about 1-3 seconds, until it went over the tree-line and i lost sight of it.  i turned back around to find a bullet-shaped craft moving about the same speed as an airplane.  it looked high up as well, maybe as thin as two needles put together, and as long as a match-head.  it made no sound and had no exhaust, like the other craft.  it was completely off-white, a little blurry.  with a grey-ish black line in the center.  it also had a slight tilt upwards to the left.  i only saw it for about 2-4 seconds, afterwords i ran like mad back to my house.  (which wasn't far, but because of the adrenaline i wasn't as winded as usual.)  for a little while afterwords, our dogs would look up at the sky when let out.  and the television as well as my laptop were doing odd things, such as the mouse/cursor spazzing-- and whatever you use to select things on the xbox 360 was also flickering, even though there was seemingly no cause.  even hours afterwords, i still feel a little on-edge.  i have tried to draw the sphere and the entity.
content.summary: 1 metalic sphere, 1 bullet-shaped white craft, 2 possibly 1 being(s)

content.detailedDescription: I walked out of my house and looked up to see a plane flying across my path and observed a strange object in between us. it was round at first and seemed to be moving fast. i initially though it was something falling from the sky because of its speed and shape. it was not consistently round enough to be a balloon and it was moving parallel to the ground swiftly. it seemed to either change shapes as it moved away or was spinning or turning.
content.summary: A black oval object which was spinning or changing shape flew above

content.detailedDescription:
I and my wife plus two teenaged grandchildren were returning home from a baseball game. it was just about 11 pm on 7/26/13. we were traveling to our home in southeast erie pa., and we were traveling southeast on our bayfront highway.
 we became engrossed in viewing a really huge, crystal clear, moon that was just emerging from the horizon. as we entered the street we live on, we no longer could see the moon. we continued driving south on our street as it ascended to higher elevations. we found a spot that gave us a view of the moon again.
 i stopped our car along the street so we all could look at the moon, and i spotted a small bright red light off to my left side (north). i thought that i also saw a hint of white light. i joked with everyone to take a look at the ufo, even though i thought it was just a helicopter. we have many life flights that come into our hamot hospital located about five miles away.
 we pulled away and circled around this block we were sitting in, and headed home. as i was backing our vehicle into our driveway, we all saw this large bright red object through our windshield. i placed the vehicle into park, and told everyone to get out, and look at this thing. everybody was talking loudly, and asking me what this thing is. we were all very excited about the object that we now were viewing.
 the object appeared to me to be shaped like a cone shaped top. it was a deep red colored object, and very bright. it was hovering at this point in time, and did not make any noise. it was much larger than any helicopter that i had seen in the marine corps. it just stayed in this location as we all walked around our car looking up at different angles of it.
 it began to sway (wobble) back and forth a little. i also thought it appeared to pulsate a little, but the others have said they did not see that. i asked our granddaughter to grab her i-pad, and take a photo. the picture immediately appeared on her i-pad screen as a white object, not red like what we were viewing. all agreed that they were viewing a red object.
 the object then appeared to slowly (minimally) move away (east) from us. it then looked as if it completely stopped moving, and began shrinking. it then just faded away, and was completely gone.
 we have no idea of how large it actually was. it appeared to be rather large. because we do not know how large it was, we do not know how close it was to us. we do know that it was not in this location when we first arrived home, or we would have seen it clearly while we looked for the moon. it seamed to be at a good distance away, when i first spotted it from further up our hill. we were shocked to see it directly in front of us, just a few minutes later when we arrived home. it was slightly northeast of our home, at about a 45 degree angle, or less, to the horizon.
 my wife and i have seen some pretty amazing things along our section of lake erie over the years, but never anything this close before.
 if i had not seen this with my own eyes, i would not have believed this object was that close to the ground, and over a populated area no less.
content.summary: Appeared as a bright deep red. shaped as a top, and bottom wobbled as it was stationary. moved away slightly then shrank as it faded away, but did appear to move away.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband is a trucker who regularly passes through a remote area of colorado on hwy 285 near the town of saguache. he had to stop for his required rest break to take a nap. when he went to lay down in the bunk he heard a strange and unfamiliar noise, a pulsating sound - one that he can't duplicate and has never heard before. he got up and looked in the rearview mirrors to see if the sound might be another truck parking behind him in the small pull off area. he observed nothing there, and decided to go lay down to nap. when he laid down and closed his eyes, not yet asleep, he again heard the noise, and felt that it was now coming from inside his head, which very much puzzled him, yet he fell asleep for approximately 15 minutes. he then had a very unusual and uncharacteristic dream: suddenly, he was in a very large white empty room, possibly like a warehouse. 

he observed his truck sitting in the room next to him. he then was levitated off the ground, turned his head to look and then his truck was no longer in the room with him. then the room became filled with colors and his truck was again there next to him in the room. he then awoke from the dream feeling strange, but not fearful. he stated that the impression he had afterwards, was that he was just another trucker passing through as thousands of other truckers do in this area, and that he was not a person of interest to whatever it was that was occurring. he also stated that he doesn't understand why he didn't get out of the truck to look around when he heard the unfamiliar pulsating sound. his reaction did not seem to me, to be the normally curious, fearless and high adventure seeking type of reaction that i know him to possess.

my husband is the type of person who has no fear of the supernatural, and made little notice of this event, other than to report it to me. he rarely has ever remembered his dreams other than occasional nightmares, which are usually of an apocalyptic nature. he is not afraid or concerned much with this event, all though he has stated that he won't be stopping on that stretch of highway again. 

i, however am concerned and have had 3 sightings of my own in my lifetime independent from him. i also have had childhood repeated dreams of similar origin to other abductees, of an examination origin. memories of being in an open mall-type setting with many observers where i was told to lay on a gurney by my mother (or possibly a mother-like figure), and that it will be "all right", and that i needed to lay on the gurney for the bb that was inside me to be removed. these dreams trouble me as i have no recollection of having any procedures done in childhood that might trigger this type of fear-filled dream. 

i also had a repeated and vivid childhood (aged 3-4 years) memory of a dream where a mechanical vehicle of some sort, making a scary booming noise came to my window. the next memory in the dream is of me looking out the window (or porthole-type shape) of a craft down on to the earth. i recall thinking in my child's mind that the earth viewed from above looked much like a patchwork quilt. this dream occurred when i was age 3-4 years old, and i had never flown on a plane until i was much older. around the same time of these dreams, i also had a sighting that i remember vividly. i was outdoors playing in my yard around dinner time, and i looked up into the sky.  high above were 4 diamond shaped shiny craft of some sort, not moving but hanging in the sky. i recalled being terrified that "they" were coming to get me and ran inside hysterical. 

i also had a sighting around the age of 14, walking home at night around 9pm. i saw out in my peripheral vision, a white light like a falling star, traveling horizontally through the sky, but at an impossibly fast rate of speed; faster than a plane and not the same trajectory as a falling star. i observed it for less than a minute, until it was obscured by the surrounding landscape.

later in life, in my late 20's i had another sighting, this time with a witness. vacationing in durango, co, myself and my then partner, sat on the deck late at night of a mountain resort. we then saw 5-6 white lights hovering stationary above a cliff peak that was across the highway from the resort. it seemed very close but we heard no sound whatsoever. the lights sat there for a minute or less, then all of them suddenly darted in different directions in a split second, and were gone. we sat there incredulous, wondering what we'd just witnessed. my ex partner was a pilot, and he knew the types of lights used on aircraft, and stated that these were not typical aircraft lights. he reported to me that he had an airborn encounter years earlier while flying his plane near the town of seabring, fl, where he spotted a cigar-shaped flying object within his path in front of him. it was lit with a green glow and darted around in his path with abnormally jerky and seemingly impossible movements, then darted out of his vision in a split second. 

due to these experiences i've encountered in my life, i have had a lifelong fear and obsession with aliens, ufo's and the unknown. i have also had pretty extreme gynecological problems throughout my life. i have had one soccerball-sized ovarian cyst removed in my 30's along with one ovary and a fallopian tube taken during this surgery. 15 years later i developed another ovarian tumor, this one the size of a cantalope or larger, which was diagnosed as a borderline ovarian cancer and lead to a complete and full hysterectomy. 

i truly wish to understand what all of this means and conquer the fear i have. this is what i work on now, is to combat the fear. if there is something going on that is inexplicable, i feel that having this fear will only leave me more vulnerable to negative psychological influences of some sort; or vulnerable to further unwanted experiences.
content.summary: Trucker spouse stopped off higway to sleep and heard a pulsating noise then fell asleep and had an uncharacteristic dream, then woke and heard the noise again

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, about 3 months ago a close friend of mine bought a new
>car, she took a picture of it in her driveway in imperial beach here in
>san diego california, when she put it on her computer, standing there
>near the front bumper (actually inside the bumper), is what looks like
>an alien phased partially in and out of reality. you can even see its
>feet and toes on the ground under the car. id like to submit the photo
>for analysis if possible. its got a lot of people wondering. the friend
>of mine is a nice woman with nothing to gain by faking it (she doesn't
>even know how to fake it) and it scared the heck out of her. i believe
>its not faked. its a very striking image of the being. i found the
>mufon group on a mini series show that was on tv recently called alien
>mysteries, specifically in the episode called corina. what struck me
>was the alien that corina describes in her encounter that she saw in
>her house look very similar to the one in the image of my friends new
>car. my friend didn't know what to do, it scared her pretty bad. i can
>email the image to you if you like. i lend a lot of credibility to this
>as i have myself seen a ufo in the night sky several years ago in long
beach california.
>i believe they have been here a long time. i just cant get over how
>much the being in this photo looks like the ones in the episode i
mentioned.
>please take a look at it, i'd appreciate it. please tell me where to
>send the image.
content.summary: Photo of short creature with arms legs large head and eyes phased in an image taken of a car

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
Decided to write this as it has been bothering me for a year now,
on the 28th/29th of july 2012 at abpprox 1am - me, freinds & family members witnessed a ufo.
coming home on the motorway, driving with 2 mates towards home on the a41 past kings langley we noticed 3 cars stopped on the motorway looking towards the cornfields, 4 people winessed lights moving high from the london directions was what they described as strobing balls of light almost translucent heading nw wards, i thought both cars were likely drunk or drugged up from olyimpic fever, a 4thd car stopped but the clouds were rolling so they all went after 10minutes.

looking over the cornfields me & ben noticed faint strobe like effects high up, we esitmate they were below lowish cloud level in the bovingdon direction from the a41, we counted maybe 6 or 7 lights, we cn only descibe them as when you have a strobe light & shine it upwards almost like the batman sign. we thought maybe an party or rave or maybe a landing for a helicopter could be the answer but no light source seemed to coming from the ground. the air felt different - static - a heightened feel, ben puts this down to the humid night but i'm not that sure.

my mates was getting a lift home to hatfield with thier girlfriends so i dropped them off in apsely & i drove home, ben called me & said he couldn't see them anymore goig home to hatfield, i got home at about 2.30am & noticed they visible from home, i woke my parents who witnessed these lights for till 3am approx at which time the clouds came in low & the sun started to brighter the horizons. i reported it to the police but had no follow up, ben also did but felt he wasn't taken seriously.On a side note my parents tried to film it, it never came out, even on nightshot, the lights were faint but visible to notice.

the reason why i have'nt reported it here is because i did report it on another site which was no help, i also contacted several news sites, newspapers & local groups but didn't have 1 response back until last week when a guy phoned up asking about it for a article on ufos over herts, my mum didn't like the sound of him so i ended the call, when i asked why it took him a year almost to answer my reports he was evasive.
its bothered us since, ben posted a message on facebook asking for witness even asking for the drivers who stopped to come forward but to no avail,
we met last week & decided to post it on mufon for hope of a better response.My other mate sam hasn't really talked about it since, i think he puts it down to a having a long hot day & evening & just atmospherics playing up in the sky.

lastly we was not drinking or taking anything, i was driving & he had 1 drink 3 hours before, we caught a movie & played some fottball, yes at night!
content.summary: 28/29 july 2012 herts ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: I was staring at my window before going to bed at night and i was on the phone at the same time, i suddenly saw a light falling from the sky. first, i though that it was a plane but it came closer and i realized that it was something like a fireball. i shouted "it's going to fall on the roof and it'll exploit" to my friend on the phone and i stayed there to watch if anything burns. nothing burned, it landed on top of the roof and the lights/fireball effect disappeared. it was moving like it's falling, but it was not something like falling. it was straight-line path and planned landing, i'm sure. i was shocked and frozen, i still am though.
content.summary: Orange fireball landed on top of the roof

content.detailedDescription:
My sister reported noticing what she thought was a satellite moving over head, but as she saw a smaller triangle of three red lights she noticed it was one big craft and it was not a little dot up in the stars it was a huge long triangle craft just over the tree tops!!! 

she could hear it but it was in a cannyan so it could have reflected some sound. she said it was translucent but she could still see a body connecting the two sets of lights together and blocking the stars out behind it. 

it was not the typical triangle it was a lot longer!! this was witnessed by her and 6 other people!! 

later she came home and found a footage on youtube of the same exact event, time date ect omnly the night vision of the camcorder you could see no craft connecting the lights. this puzzled my sister rebeckah!! buy the way i am wayne mcintee writing this report for my sister who saw this event! 

the difference from the footage and her sighting is the footage shows the craft over 500 feet up! where my sister saw the craft just over the tree tops!! having said that it looked like glass as she could clearly see a craft which the lights where merely lights on this huge triangle craft but the craft itself was translucent she could see the craft and she could see the outline of it..
content.summary: Very long trinagle. smalll triangle following one red light. connected by a translucent craft!

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the phone looking out the window when i saw a red light moving over the treeline through the window around half past midnight on july 27th 2013.
as i watched it continued brightening and dimming in a regular pattern, but unlike an airplane strobe, there was no white light, only the same color of pure red.
i mentioned what i was seeing to the person on the phone and called my spouse over to look and he saw it too. together we watched it until it moved out of sight behind the fence and trees.

it appeared to be moving in a straight-line path at about a walking pace in an easterly direction and the entire sighting lasted no more than 2-3 minutes.

at one point the red flashing orb appeared to have two smaller red lights of the same color appeared on either side of the main orb, giving it a lenticular outline. after a moment the smaller lights went out, or the object turned so the lights were not visible to me
content.summary: Silent regularly pulsing pure red orb moving in a slow path in easterly direction

content.detailedDescription:
My wife encountered a bright light at night.  she was going outside to remove cloths from cloths line, when she saw the bright light just hovering above a tree.  the tree was in the back yard, about 15 feet away from her.  she went back into the garage and took the 35 mm camera from the car.  all she could see was a bright light.  the photo shows the result of the bright light.
the second photo was taken inside the garage, may 2006.  she also heard a loud noise in the garage, while inside the house.  she could see a dim light just floating up in a corner of the walls in the garage.  the garage was lit up by this light.  the results of the dim light is shown in the picture.
content.summary: 35 mm exposure of an alien like being.

content.detailedDescription: I'm at an event called whaling days in silverdale washington and noticed a bright cylindrical object moving at an extremely high rate of speed with a flashing light spinning around it at random times. the light was white and occasionaly redish orange. it was at a further distance and traveling north and when i asked my wife to see it, i lost sight of it and it was directly above us. when i finally caught sight of it, my wife looked away and it vanished before my eyes. i didn't know what it was and i felt as if it was under intelligent control.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Cylinder shaped object with random flashing light

content.detailedDescription: I'm at an event called whaling days in silverdale washington and noticed a bright cylindrical object moving at an extremely high rate of speed with a flashing light spinning around it at random times. the light was white and occasionaly redish orange. it was at a further distance and traveling north and when i asked my wife to see it, i lost sight of it and it was directly above us. when i finally caught sight of it, my wife looked away and it vanished before my eyes. i didn't know what it was and i felt as if it was under intelligent control.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Cylinder shaped object with random flashing light

content.detailedDescription: On july 26 th, 2013, at 10:50 pm central time. i was sitting with my wife in our back yard patio just relaxing.  i was admiring the sky/stars at night. watching planes fly, and trying to figure out the certain constellations. all of a sudden, right in my field of vision, facing south/south west , a star made a super white bright flash, and took off going up at 45 degree angle leaving a white trail as it sped off going up. it lasted a total of 2-3 seconds at most. my wife, who was looking up also, did not see a thing.
content.summary: I was sitting in back yard looking at the stars. bright flash, speed off super fast going up

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my backyard facing west looking at the sky. i seen the object coming from the west and getting closer and closer. as it got closer the shape started to become clearer, and it was definitely a big black rectangle (it looked like a cell phone, is the best i could describe it). i was stunned and i froze in place and just kept watching it head towards the east. then, two giant circular lights turned on at the same time from the bottom/underneath of the craft and stayed on for approximately 6 seconds then shut off at the same time. the lights seemed like they were glowing as if you would see light behind frosted glass. they were bright but dim at the same time. if those lights had never turned on i would not have known they were there. the big black rectangle continued to head east at a steady even medium pace, it was not going too fast and it was not going too slow. there was absolutely no noises associated with this craft.
content.summary: I seen a big black rectangular craft, then 2 giant circular lights on the bottom of it turned on at the same time for 6 seconds then shut off.

content.detailedDescription: My father was driving, we were in a 90s ford pickup. we were having a casual conversation, and while i was turned facing him, my attention was caught by turning lights. from my angle, it was visually below my father's jaw line. i have seen a meteor shower and the light and a similar "natural" glow, no streaks or beams like i see with artificial lights. the difference was the fact that the lights did not burn out or go any lower in the sky. the 3 lights were rotating as if, for example, if someone was holding a ball in their left hand, they would pass it around front to their right hand and from their right hand pass it around their back to their left hand and repeat. also, as i explained in the short description, the rotation of clock hands if the clock was laid face down. as my father drove north, i watched the 3 lights rotate at the same height for less than 20 seconds until we turned away from it. there is an air force base north east of that location so i have seen many aircraft lights at night and none appeared that size, light type or stationary. there were residential lights to compare size and how high above the horizon. lights near the horizon were much smaller and lower in comparison. i was too interested in the movement of the lights to alert my father. kept it to myself for over a year.
content.summary: Driving north, looking to my left i saw 3 yellow orbs that appeared to spin clockwise. if you laid a clock face down flat, the direction the hands turn.

content.detailedDescription: We have seen this object in the area north of kingston ontario canada many times. it moves very silently and i have chased it while driving and it took off to the east. see attached video. if we get more this we will be sending it to you.
content.summary: Star like object hovers and sometimes moves with lightneing emitting from it.
